author: will7466
content:
An update on our progress (we shared this in the core dev calls a few days ago):
- MVP implementation just finished in geth, passing tests & we have an internal AA testnet to the spec Vitalik proposed here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/implementing-account-abstraction-as-part-of-eth1-x/4020. 
The current diff is here: https://github.com/quilt/go-ethereum/pull/13. We need to expand tests further and do some cleanup (WIP) but it is working at this point.
- We are collecting data, performance metrics right now and will share results in due time. We are using https://github.com/lightclient/bazooka to stress test and send transactions across the wire.
- We are currently creating AA transactions which use calldata to determine the # of loops (each 26 gas), whether the validation calls the `PAYGAS` opcode, and what gas price is called via  `PAYGAS`
- We are now starting brainstorming sessions to begin discussion on expanding beyond the initial MVP to support multiple txs per account, proxy patterns, and other improvements

author: will7466
content: The contract for these AA transactions is here: https://github.com/quilt/go-ethereum/pull/13/files#diff-2ebab6769b19eeb122463079d8c9db24R35 - we'll start working on more practical contracts/usecases soon.
